attributes.action: BRING BACK THE RED STREET TELEPHONE BOXS & ROUTE MASTER BUSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BRING BACK THE RED PHONE BOXS AND ROUTE MASTER BUSES AS THIS IS A PART OF OUR BRITISH HERETAGE. AND ITS WHAT TOURISTS COME TO SEE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
